This side dish can be cooked by sautéing the broccoli in a pan with garlic, olive oil, and salt and pepper.

To cook the salmon and broccoli side dish, heat a skillet over medium heat and add olive oil. Add the broccoli and cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes. Add the salmon and season with salt and pepper. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the salmon is cooked through.
